data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 8,278 believers in Devbhumi Dwarka against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Devbhumi Dwarka, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 8,278 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Devbhumi Dwarka, Gujarat, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Devbhumi Dwarka, Gujarat, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, please remember the Valmiki, Balmiki (Hindu traditions) people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, teach the 8,278 believers in Devbhumi Dwarka that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Devbhumi Dwarka.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Devbhumi Dwarka, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Devbhumi Dwarka
location.people_groups_list: Shemalia, Nadia, Kasbati (Muslim traditions), Brahmin Tapodhan, Gadhai
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Shemalia (2,800), Nadia (54,000), Kasbati (Muslim traditions) (10,000), Brahmin Tapodhan (30,000), Gadhai (100)
